brief_description: Chhattisgarh state Government started a scheme "Viranarayan Singh Shram Ann Yojana" for unorganized worker on 17 January 2018.
detailed_description: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme &amp;quot;Viranarayan Singh Shram Ann Yojana&amp;quot; for unorganized worker on 17 January 2018. The main objective of the scheme to provide the food assistance for unorganized worker at their work places.
benefits: Hot food is being distributed to construction workers at ₹ 5/- in food centers. Cooked rice, dal, vegetable or khichdi, fai dal, vegetable or cumin rice, fried dal, vegetable. Pickles will also be payable along with the food.
eligibility_criteria: Registered unorganized workers are eligible for benefits.

steps: There is no need to apply to avail the benefits. Beneficiaries can avail benefits by visiting their nearest food distribution center.

documents_required: Aadhaar Card. Permanent residence certificate. Registration Card
